(()=>{function p({getGlobal:t,setGlobal:c,translateArguments:i}){let s={},d=t();c(function(...r){let u=i({originalArguments:r,accessibilityEventParameters:s});d.apply(window,u)});try{o({mediaFeature:"prefers-reduced-motion",possibleValues:["no-preference","reduce"]}),o({mediaFeature:"prefers-color-scheme",possibleValues:["light","dark"]}),o({mediaFeature:"inverted-colors",possibleValues:["none","inverted"]}),o({mediaFeature:"forced-colors",possibleValues:["none","active"]}),o({mediaFeature:"prefers-contrast",possibleValues:["no-preference","more","less","custom"]})}catch(e){console.error(e)}(function(){try{let r=setInterval(function(){let n=document.querySelector(":focus-visible");if(!n)return;let a=n.tagName.toUpperCase();a==="INPUT"||a==="TEXTAREA"||n.contentEditable!=="true"&&(s["uses-keyboard"]=!0,clearInterval(r))},500)}catch(r){console.error(r)}})();function o({mediaFeature:e,possibleValues:r}){l({mediaFeature:e,possibleValues:r})}function l({mediaFeature:e,possibleValues:r}){if(f({mediaFeature:e})===!1)return;let n=r.map(a=>({possibleValue:a,mediaQueryResult:window.matchMedia(\`(\${e}: \${a})\`).matches})).find(({_:a,mediaQueryResult:b})=>b===!0);if(n===void 0){console.error(\`Something went wrong. Is there a new \${e} allowed value not accounted for here?\`);return}s[e]=n.possibleValue}function f({mediaFeature:e}){return window.matchMedia(\`not all and (\${e}), (\${e})\`).matches?!0:(console.warn(\`Your browser doesn't support \${e} yet\`),!1)}}function m(){p({getGlobal:()=>window.plausible,setGlobal:t=>{window.plausible=t},translateArguments:({originalArguments:t,accessibilityEventParameters:c})=>{let i=[...t];if(t.length>=2){let s=t[1],o={...s?.props,...c},l={...s,props:o};i[1]=l}return i}})}m();})();
